eu_initiatives:
The Compostela Group is currently partner or associate partner in the following projects:  
- HousErasmus+ (562263-EPP-1-2015-BE-EPPKA3-PI-FORWARD) 
- CALOHEE - Measuring and Comparing Achievements of Learning Outcomes in Higher Education in Europe (562148-EPP-1-2015-1-NL-EPPKA3-PI-FORWARD) 
- EVALUATE - Evaluating and Upscaling Tele Collaborative Teacher Education (582934-EPP-1-2016-2-ES-EPPKA2-EPPKA3-PI-POLICY) 
-EWP 2.0 - Erasmus Without Papers 2.0 (Erasmus+ KA3) 
-TIGRIS-Transfer of Good practices & Reinforcement of Internationalization Strategies in Kurdistan (Erasmus+ KA2)
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
